original_text: The Lord also said, ‘I will send Israel's people away to live in foreign lands. Then they will have to eat unclean food, as you will do now.’
korean_text: 또 여호와께서 이르시되 내가 여러 나라들로 쫓아내어 흩어 버릴 이스라엘 자손이 거기서 이같이 부정한 떡을 먹으리라 하시기로

sentences.original_text: I will send Israel's people away
Then they will have to eat unclean food
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그들은 부정한 음식을 먹어야 할 것이다
